plugin.name: ðŸ—ƒ Summaries
plugin.description: Generate summaries from notes for a given time period, and save to notes. And save search results over all notes. Requires configuring to suit your use of NotePlan. Click link for more details and settings.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: saveSearchResults
plugin.commands.description: Save results from a search over all notes

plugin.commands.name: saveSearchResultsInPeriod
plugin.commands.description: Save results from a search of specified tags or mentions over notes from a time period

plugin.commands.name: countsInPeriod
plugin.commands.description: Generate counts (and other stats) of tags and mentions for a time period

plugin.commands.name: insertProgressUpdate
plugin.commands.description: Insert weekly/monthly progress update to current note

plugin.commands.name: weeklyStats
plugin.commands.description: Generate stats for tags and mentions for all weeks this year, and write CSV to a note

plugin.settings.title: Folder name
plugin.settings.description: Folder to store any output files in

plugin.settings.title: Folders to exclude
plugin.settings.description: List of folders to exclude in these commands. May be empty. (Note that @Trash and @Archive are always excluded.)

plugin.settings.title: Heading level
plugin.settings.description: Heaing level (1-5) to use when writing output to notes

plugin.settings.title: In the following the includes (if specified) take precedence over any excludes. Items in the list need to be included in quotes, separated by commas.
plugin.settings.description: In the following the includes (if specified) take precedence over any excludes. Items in the list need to be included in quotes, separated by commas.

plugin.settings.title: Hashtag counts heading
plugin.settings.description: Heading to go before section of #hashtag counts

plugin.settings.title: Mention counts heading
plugin.settings.description: Heading to go before section of @mention counts

plugin.settings.title: Show hashtag or mention as links?
plugin.settings.description: Whether to show the # or @ symbols, or hide them to stop them being active links. (Beware double counting if you turn this on and save results in daily notes.)

plugin.settings.title: Include hashtags
plugin.settings.description: List of #hashtags to include in counts (e.g. '#holiday', '#jog', '#commute', '#webinar'). These take precedence over any excluded hashtags (next field). If this list is empty, all hashtags will be included.

plugin.settings.title: Exclude hashtags
plugin.settings.description: List of #hashtags to exclude in counts. If empty, none will be excluded.

plugin.settings.title: Include @mentions
plugin.settings.description: List of @mentions to include in counts (e.g. '@work', '@fruitveg', '@water', '@sleep'). These take precedence over any excluded mentions (next field). If this list is empty, all mentions will be included.

plugin.settings.title: Exclude @mentions
plugin.settings.description: List of @mentions to exclude in counts. If empty, none will be excluded.

plugin.settings.title: Default Search terms
plugin.settings.description: Optional list of search terms to use by default. If empty, you will be asked for terms each time you run the command.

plugin.settings.title: Saved Search heading
plugin.settings.description: Heading to go before search output

plugin.settings.title: Prefix for search results
plugin.settings.description: String to put at the start of each search result line. Default is '-'. Can also be empty.

plugin.settings.title: Highlight matching search terms?
plugin.settings.description: Whether to use ==highlight== of matched occurrences in output. (Works best when using a theme with highlighting.)

plugin.settings.title: Show empty matches?
plugin.settings.description: If no matches of the search term(s) are found, setting this true will still show a heading for the term(s)

plugin.settings.title: Date style
plugin.settings.description: Where the context for a match is a date, does it get appended as a 'date' using your locale, or as a NP date 'link' (`>date`), or `at` (`@date`) or 'none'

plugin.settings.title: Progress heading
plugin.settings.description: Heading to go before Progress Update output

plugin.settings.title: Included #hashtags for Progress
plugin.settings.description: List of #hashtags to includes in Progress updates. If this list is empty, no hashtags will be included.

plugin.settings.title: Progress @mentions for Progress
plugin.settings.description: List of @mentions to includes in Progress updates. If this list is empty, no mentions will be included.

plugin.settings.title: Weekly Stats Duration (in weeks)
plugin.settings.description: Number of weeks to look back when generating weekly stats for plotting
